title: Needing Pelty, Reilly and Bates to finish off a mini t204 project....paying strong!
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Needing Pelty, Reilly and Bates to finish off a mini t204 project....paying strong!
posts.post_content:
Looking for these players out of the set in particular and will pay very generously for any of those listed above.  Thanks much,
Brian

Knocked a few cards off the list of the t204s I was especially needing.  Down to just these four that I'm seeking a little more aggressively.  Willing to buy/trade well above market for these final few.  Any help is always appreciated!
Down to just Pelty, Reilly and Bates and I'll have this micro t204 project finished.  Thanks in advance if you can help!
